cause.description:
SC Clean air is a collaboration of the Smoke Free Action Network (SFAN) and The South Carolina African American Tobacco Control Network (SCAATCN). We work to promote smoke-free workplaces for all South Carolinians.
We have been instrumental in getting the following nine municipalities to go smoke free in South Carolina: Sullivan’s Island, Liberty, Greenville, Columbia, Beaufort County, Bluffton, Charleston, Aiken County, and Hilton Head Island.
Please check out blog for recent news and information: http://www.smokefreesc.blogspot.com/
You can also join our regular Facebook group "Smoke Free SC" http://cofc.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2232853518
Please email us with comments, questions, or if you need more information. SmokeFreeActionNetwork@gmail.com
1. All workers deserve the right to work in a smoke free environment
cause.mission: Working to promote healthier communities and smoke free air for ALL South Carolinians
